definitions.definition: clothes and linens that need to be washed or that have been newly washed.
synonyms: dirty clothes "a big pile of laundry"

definitions.definition: the action or process of washing clothes and linens.
examples: I talked her into letting me help Ben with the rest of the laundry

definitions.definition: a room in a house, hotel, or institution where clothes and linens can be washed and ironed.
examples: laundry room, launderette; MoretrademarkLaundromat; cleaners, dry cleaners "the facilities include a laundry"MoreLaundromat; cleaners, dry cleaners the facilities include a laundry

definitions.definition: a business that washes and irons clothes and linens commercially.
